desc_short: Boost ATK by 10%, wind resistance by 20% and chance of evading physical attacks (Not stackable)
提高10%攻擊、20%風屬性耐性的數值+一定機率閃避物理攻擊[無法重複裝備]
공격력 10% 상승, 바람속성 저항력 20% 상승+일정 확률로 물리공격 회피 (중복 장착 불가)
Augmente l'ATT de 10%, la rés. au vent 20% et chance d'esquiver des att. phy. (non cumulable)
Erhöht ANG um 10%, Windresistenz um 20% und Chance phys. Angriffen auszuweichen (Nicht stapelbar).
Aumenta el ATQ un 10%, la res. al viento un 20% y la probabilidad de evitar ataques físicos (no acumulable)
desc_long: Boosts ATK by 10%, wind resistance by 20% and chance of evading physical attacks. Not stackable.
提高10%攻擊、20%風屬性耐性的數值，並有一定機率閃避物理攻擊[無法重複裝備]。
공격력이 10%, 바람속성 저항력이 20% 상승하고, 일정 확률로 물리공격을 회피합니다. (중복 장착 불가)
Augmente l'ATT de 10%, la résistance au vent 20% et chance d'esquiver des attaques physiques. Non cumulable.
Erhöht ANG um 10%, Windresistenz um 20% und Chance phys. Angriffen auszuweichen (Nicht stapelbar).
Aumenta el ATQ un 10%, la resistencia al viento un 20% y la probabilidad de evitar ataques físicos (no acumulable).
